entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
